name: Sidney Jones
title: Senior Software Engineer — DevOps & Cloud Infrastructure
summary: Hands-on senior software engineer with 20+ years building scalable backend systems and cloud infrastructure. Passionate polyglot proficient in Python, Java, Go, and JavaScript. Deep expertise in Kubernetes, Terraform, and AWS. Track record mentoring engineers, shipping pragmatic solutions, and thriving in ambiguous, fast-moving environments. Strong opinions, loosely held.

technical_proficiencies.frameworks: FastAPI, Flask, Spring Boot, Node.js, .NET Core
technical_proficiencies.cloud_devops: AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, S3, EC2), Kubernetes, Terraform, GitHub Actions, Jenkins, Docker, ArgoCD
technical_proficiencies.specializations: Infrastructure-as-Code, CI/CD Pipelines, DevSecOps, Microservices Architecture, Cloud Modernization

bullets.text: Architected Infrastructure-as-Code solutions using Terraform for AWS environments, enabling clients to scale from startup to enterprise-grade deployments.
Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions and Jenkins, automating build, test, and deployment workflows for multiple teams.
Embedded DevSecOps practices including OIDC-based authentication, SBOM generation, and secure secret management across cloud infrastructure.
Mentored engineers on cloud-native best practices, Kubernetes deployment patterns, and infrastructure automation.

Mentored engineers on cloud-native patterns, microservice decomposition, and pragmatic architecture decisions.
Architected payment microservices processing $1M+ daily transactions with zero tolerance for failure.
Established one of the company's first automated build and test pipelines, introducing CI/CD before it was mainstream.
Introduced trunk-based development and continuous integration practices, enabling faster, safer deployments.
Mentored distributed teams on code quality, testing, and pragmatic delivery practices.
